name: Automated Pentesting Tool (Bamboo)
body: Developed Bamboo, a custom Command and Control (C2) framework focused on privilege escalation and post-exploitation. Researched and implemented payload execution, post-exploitation, and evasion techniques on the C2 agent using Go. Tested against Elastic Stack's security features.

name: Portfolio Website
body: This website you are looking at now, made to show my experience and skills. Information on this webpage is populated through JSON files, allowing me to easily update and modify content on the site.

name: RenderCV: Split YAML
body: Scripts used to set up RenderCV and render the resume with content stored in seperate YAML files.

name: Python System Monitor
body: A web application that shows system resources being used using psutil and flask for the web application.

name: Notion calendar Program
body: Simple JavaScript program to added the week label of the (SP) semester to a notion calendar. Can specify which weeks are MST/EST/Exams and holidays
